decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Lighting specifications, block plan, and planning  statement received 13 March 2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The luminance of the floodlights shall not exceed 100 lux.  Once installed, the applicant shall, within one month, arrange for a site visit by the local planning authority after dark and with the lighting in operation to ensure that the lights are properly shielded and adjusted to avoid any nuisance to nearby residents and the lights shall be adjusted it necessary to prevent any such nuisance following this site visit and permanently maintained in that condition thereafter.
Condition : 4 - The floodlights shall be turned off by 10 pm every day.
description: Erection and installation of floodlighting for sports field
